title: Dialogue Series:  Psyche and Mercury
marks: Signature at corner of panel with man\'s face, incised: [SH (
description: three planar forms and partial spherical form; two roughly triangular pieces--one has drawing of woman\'s face in profile, with the edge of her profile cut out of edge of wood piece; roughly four-sided piece with profile of man drawn facing back of piece with woman\'s face, with profile cut in similar fashion; man\'s face has wing extending from temple; open spherical form at top with grey and yellow at interior; predominately white and cream
creditline: Gift of the collection of Mari and Irving Lipton
